snippet: President Enrique Peña Nieto promised on Monday to modify the strategy, spearheaded by his predecessor, Felipe Calderón, of unleashing the military on narcotics organizations.
abstract: Mexico's Pres Enrique Pena Nieto promises to modify strategy of unleashing military on narcotics organizations.
lead_paragraph: President Enrique Peña Nieto promised on Monday to modify the strategy, spearheaded by his predecessor, Felipe Calderón, of unleashing the military on narcotics organizations.

headline.seo: Mexico’s New Leader Outlines Shift in Antidrug Policy
headline.main: Mexico: New Leader Outlines Shift in Antidrug Policy
headline.print_headline: Mexico: New Leader Outlines Shift in Antidrug Policy
